website_summaries.verdict: Sprint's Kyocera Torque stands apart from other rugged smartphones by delivering a strong durable design without sacrificing features.
pros: The Kyocera Torque is a rugged, waterproof touch-screen phone that's equipped with 4G LTE,Smart Sonic audio technology, and excellent stereo speakers
cons: The Torque is bulky, has a sluggish processor, and takes mediocre photos

customer_reviews.title: leaves it exposed in bad weather, etc
customer_reviews.text: To say my husband is hard on his phone is an understatement...he drops it, leaves it on the top of his car (while driving away), leaves it exposed in bad weather, etc. My dad purchased a Kyocera Torque last year and has been very happy with how it holds up. I decided to try it for my husband. He likes that it is rugged but still a smartphone. It can definitely take a beating and it even takes photos underwater! Very happy with the purchase and happy with how easy it was to get activated. We bought a SIM card from ebay and activated it over the phone with Sprint.
customer_reviews.author: mj13

customer_reviews.title: didnt get a good ONE.....
customer_reviews.text: This phone didnt last a good 6mo beforebitvwent out!!but was still under warranty so got a replacement!!my husband has one he got his from Sprint haven't had any problems with his!!!but over ALL its a great phone!!he's very rough with phones and its still working even with the type of work he does!!!i guess its just not such a goid idea to purchase phones on these sites!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ESB👧.....

customer_reviews.title: phone was amazing until kyocera and sprint did an over the air ...
customer_reviews.text: phone was amazing until kyocera and sprint did an over the air update to the software and it bricked the phone. sprint replaced it with a remanufactured one that fried in a month. in a year i went through 4 of these phones. Rugged yes but the software is crap, onboard storage in almost nothing, and there is absolutely no developer support for it.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Torque (Sprint) Smart Rugged Phone, Water, Dust, and Drop Proof
customer_reviews.text: 8-9 of us at work have these units for our work smart-phones / direct connects. They work adequately and we would probably like them better if the SPRINT signal was better in Phoenix, AZ. They stand up to most of our abuse and we have only had to replace them from theft or a broken screen except for one that had an internal problem that was taken care of by warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after coming out of a contract and needed a snartphone.t I have had this phone all of one week and beyond disappointed. Keeps shutting on and off. Finally decided not to come back on. Not tomention the stress and rudeness I dealt with to get this ohone. Should have set off a red flag. Bonus is no charger!!!
customer_reviews.author: kenya beasley

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: So far not a problem with the phone it came with the original charger and also the SIM card! Sprint hooked it up without no problem. The buttons at times want to stick sometimes when u try and dial a number but over all so far it’s working well for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: battery life is good, if it falls no problem
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a very indestructible phone,this is the #1 ,battery life is good,if it falls no problem,but remember,phones aren't for dropping,the speaker is very very loud,the camera of 5 megapixels is decent,it's support scratches like you have not idea,i've had it for a year and it looks new,overall it's a good phone and it's cheap!
customer_reviews.author: irvin lacayo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It had a broken SIM card slot, however I was able to repair that.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: A great little phone
customer_reviews.text: This is such a neat phone!!! Had a few bugs at first, got straightened out at the Sprint store, and now it works fine. Best of all it's SMALL, so it fits in my pocket. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Bosner

customer_reviews.title: Good phone if you need a smart phone with push to talk feature
customer_reviews.text: I received it by date promised and as was described. Upgraded from a Motorola Admiral and made a difference. It works great, don't be deceived by the rugged look of the phone like I was. It seems as it comes with a cover so it isn't as bulky as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Antonieta B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone so much that I bought an old ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so much that I bought an old used one after mine died. Could use larger memory, but the most rugged phone I've ever had.Beat up or not, I know I can't kill it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it back in July and today nov. 2nd ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it back in July and today nov. 2nd battery is dead. I have a lot of problems with reception and connection, I do no use it enough for the battery to have died already. I can't use it half the time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it works really good but my son has only had it a couple months

customer_reviews.title: tough tough phone
customer_reviews.text: it holds up to abuse. can't put any apps on it as it has no internal memory space. but I have thrown it across the warehouse and made a call immediately after.

customer_reviews.title: so glad we made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: When our Samsung Galaxy 3 stopped working after too many drops, after a lot of research, we decided to get a the more durable torque. My husband is in construction and this phone has been perfect for his working conditions.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good phone. Just have to keep memory clear ,or it won't update your apps.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soonersoft provided one of the best customer experiences that I've ever seen!

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, quirky

customer_reviews.text: Great for working men who still want a smartphone but don't want to be worried about it breaking all the time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: KEVKEV!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for just the sound-speckers on the phone there great compared to the newer phones around. . Thats about it

customer_reviews.title: Upsetting!! Cell phone did not include SIM Card
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours on with customer service and at the sprint store we were finally able to set up the phone! Would have been a lot easier if we had the SIM Card to begin with. Definitely disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

customer_reviews.title: amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: love this phone i bought to i tested the limits of the other one lol just wish i coulda saved 70 bucks last time
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: The Kyocera Torque was made for someone like me. It is has been dropped
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am a person that should never have been trusted with a smartphone. This year alone I have decimated four phones, dropping them, stepping on them, spilling water on them, you get the picture. The Kyocera Torque was made for someone like me. It is has been dropped, even in a mud puddle and works perfectly! It doesn't have all the bells and whistles, but you get your email, can text and do Facebook and run the millions of apps that are out there on it. If you are accident prone this phone is for you!
customer_reviews.author: BookieMomma

customer_reviews.title: Was not working.
customer_reviews.text: Phone came in not working order as promised. Had to return and wait for credit before finding another phone :( very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable, but just okay Phone.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He doesn't like it very much, but it's a phone. I can say that it is SUPER durable. My husband says there is not enough memory on it, but I think he is trying to watch the football game on it. :P I don't think this is the phone for you, if you like using a lot of apps.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Torque
customer_reviews.text: I nice pocketable tough phone. It is a little underpowered, but jets the job done. Runs Android Jellybean, so its fairly modern. The screen is low resolution, but very bright and legable in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell S.

customer_reviews.title: Great transition for electronically challenged men who prefer that old ...
customer_reviews.text: Great transition for electronically challenged men who prefer that old flip phone! Has stood the test of time with splashes, lots of tumbles and a lot of sawdust!

customer_reviews.title: It's ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this phone 4 stars because the battery life sucks and the phone it's slow the memory sucks on this one that I got. Other than that the phone works as expected. So needless to say I'm not too disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: It is a great phone for a construction worker or contractor. It is a little out dated but works great and is very resilient.

product_meta.title: Kyocera Torque (Sprint) Smart Rugged Phone, Water, Dust, and Drop Proof
product_meta.description: Rugged waterproof design meets IP67 rating for dust and water immersion and Military Standard 810G for dust, shock, vibration, temperature extremes, blowing rain, low pressure, solar radiation, salt fog, humidity and immersion for up to 30 minutes in up to 1 meter (3.28 ft) of water. Smart Sonic Receiver technology hear conversations clearer than ever before in noisy environments Sprint Direct Connect - next-generation push-to-talk (PTT) powered by Sprint's nationwide broadband network Sprint 4G LTE connect to the world of data at high speed Powerful 2500 mAh lithium ion battery plus added energy - saving features - MaxiMZR and Eco Mode apps for managing and conserving power consumption. 5MP camera and camcorder/1.3MP front-facing camerarear-facing camera includes enhanced features: panorama, HDR (High Dynamic Range), facial recognition, smile/blink detection, macro and burst mode settings. Phone is inoperable under water or when wet. To ensure that your phone is waterproof, make sure the connector covers and battery door are properly sealed. Product Details: Advanced rugged design with textured Android hard keys, reinforced housing, non-slip Dura-Grip and loud, front-facing speakers Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) with access to thousands of Android apps like Google Play, Google Maps, Google Navigation, Google Talk, GoogleCalendar, Google+, Google Latitude, Gmail, and YouTube 4.0" IPS ruggedized, impact-resistant touchscreen Additional back connector for desktop cha...
